OrderItemAdjustmentLineItem.name: OrderItemAdjustmentLineItem
OrderItemAdjustmentLineItem.description: An adjustment that has been made to an order item.

AdjustmentAmountScope.description: Used with AdjustmentValue to determine the amount of the adjustment.

AdjustmentSource.description: Indicates the origin of the adjustment.

AdjustmentType.description: Indicates the type of mathematical adjustment to be applied to the order.

AdjustmentValue.description: The specified AdjustmentType’s amount to be applied to the order item.

Amount.description: The net total value of the adjustment line. The value is rounded to the nearest possible amount associated with the currency of the order item.

AppliedPromotionDate.description: The date and time on which the promotion was applied to the asset.

CouponCode.description: The ID of the coupon code that was applied.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only for orgs with the multicurrency feature enabled. Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization. Default value is USD.

Description.description: Users can add a custom description to the record to provide additional detail.

OrderAdjustmentGroupId.description: The order adjustment group that contains the order item adjustment line item.

OrderId.description: The parent order of the order item related to the adjustment line.

OrderItemId.description: The order item that the adjustment line applies to.

Priority.description: A numeric value that represents the order of precedence of the order adjustment group.

RelatedAdjustmentLineItemId.description: The original order item adjustment line. Useful for reference in change order scenarios.

TotalAmtWithTax.description: Equals the order item’s price plus TotalTaxAmount for the order item adjustment line item.

TotalTaxAmount.description: The total amount of tax applied to the adjustment line.
